translation.en: Vision, normal.
Hearing, normal.
Smell… [sniffs] …normal.
Pain perception, normal.
Blood glucose, electrolytes, enzymes, all abnormally normal.
translation.it: Glicemia, elettroliti, enzimi, tutto fin troppo normale.

translation.en: Just what you'd expect from a brand-new body.
translation.it: Quello che ci si aspetta da un corpo nuovo.

translation.en: Emotional responses and stress tolerance, normal.
translation.it: Reazioni emotive e tolleranza allo stress, normali.

translation.en: Memories, clear.
I am human.
Morning, Nina.
Hi, Mack.
Would you please come to the medical room?
For the physical?
Just give me a moment to take all this in.
translation.it: Dammi un attimo per metabolizzare tutto.

translation.en: I was just born into this world, you know.
translation.it: Sono appena nato in questo mondo.

translation.en: The printing is accurate, right down to the patterns in the iris.
translation.it: La stampa è precisa fino alla trama dell'iride.

translation.en: Even twins don't match that well.
Mmm. My taste buds seem to be working fine too.
Although this stuff may not look all that appetizing, it's not bad.
translation.it: Questa roba non ha un bell'aspetto, ma non è male.

translation.en: When I eat it, I can tell that it tastes good.
translation.it: Quando la mangio, so che ha un buon sapore.

translation.en: We're instinctively comparing it to food we ate in the past.
translation.it: D'istinto, la confrontiamo con il cibo mangiato in passato.

translation.en: What about your memories? How's the connection?
translation.it: Che mi dici dei ricordi? Com'è la connessione?

translation.en: When I was getting backed up, I lay down on the bed and closed my eyes.
translation.it: Durante il backup, mi sono sdraiata e ho chiuso gli occhi.

translation.en: And then when I opened them again, I was on the other side of space.
translation.it: Quando li ho riaperti, ero dall'altro lato del cosmo.

translation.en: It's kind of a shock.
[Mack] Same here.
I have the illusion of my consciousness just continuing right from that day.
translation.it: Ho l'illusione che la mia coscienza continui da quel preciso giorno,

translation.en: But the physical person I am now, it's-- It's not the person who got their memory backed up.
translation.it: ma quei ricordi non appartengono alla persona fisica che sono ora.

translation.en: Oscar's finished printing.
Amazing.
The cavity's gone. This new body's fantastic.
translation.it: La carie è sparita. Questo corpo nuovo è fantastico.

translation.en: Yes!
Hey, I think it's about time we got to work. We can, after everybody's printed.
translation.it: - Penso sia ora di metterci al lavoro. - Dopo che saranno stampati tutti.

translation.en: [Mack] We need to get going before the migrant vessel gets here.
translation.it: Muoviamoci prima che arrivi la nave dei migranti.

translation.en: [chuckles] Bullshit.
The migrants won't arrive for another hundred years.
translation.it: I migranti non arriveranno per altri cento anni.

translation.en: Living beings can't make it through subspace, even in cryosleep.
translation.it: Nessuno sopravvive al subspazio, nemmeno in criosonno,

translation.en: They can't warp here.
Damn it.
-[Mack] Hello, Patty. -[Oscar] Hey, Patty.
Good morning, everyone.
[Mack] While we're waiting for Lewis, let's talk.
We're almost at our destination of Planet X-10.
translation.it: Siamo quasi a destinazione: il pianeta X-10.

translation.en: We've already entered its star system.
translation.it: Siamo già nel suo sistema solare.

translation.en: How many days has it been since we left Earth?
translation.it: Da quanti giorni abbiamo lasciato la Terra?

translation.en: It's been what, a week?
But of course, that's in days based on the rotation of the Earth.
translation.it: Ovvio, in giorni basati sulla rotazione terrestre.

translation.en: So where are our original selves now?
translation.it: Dove saranno i nostri sé originali?

translation.en: We can't track them in real time. But if we were to make a rough estimate…
translation.it: Non possiamo seguirli in tempo reale, ma se dovessi fare una stima

translation.en: the migrant vessel should be around here.
translation.it: la nave dei migranti dovrebbe essere più o meno qui.

translation.en: It's a long trip, so everyone's in cryosleep to keep from aging.
translation.it: Il viaggio è lungo e in criosonno non invecchiano.

translation.en: Our original selves are dreaming away.
translation.it: I nostri sé originali se la dormono.

translation.en: It must be strange for them too. Another version of their self has been created
translation.it: Dev'essere strano anche per loro. È stata creata una loro versione

translation.en: on the other side of space and is working while they're asleep.
translation.it: dall'altra parte del cosmo che lavora mentre dormono.

translation.en: We were chosen and given special permission to be printed by The Womb.
translation.it: Il Grembo ci ha scelti e ci ha autorizzato a essere stampati.

translation.en: It's an honor.
We were selected because we were the most qualified.
translation.it: Siamo qui perché siamo i più qualificati.

translation.en: So we have to make Planet X-10 a comfortable place to live before they arrive.
translation.it: Dobbiamo rendere abitabile il pianeta X-10 prima che arrivino.

translation.en: -[alert blaring] -What's happening?
Shit! It's an electromagnetic wave. And it's damn strong.
translation.it: Merda! Un'onda elettromagnetica. Ed è bella forte.

translation.en: It can't be.
It's a flare.
[sighs] Had me going for a second.
No reports of fire. But there are some areas I can't confirm.
translation.it: Non rilevo incendi, ma per alcune aree non posso confermarlo.

translation.en: Looks like some of the electronic equipment isn't responding.
All right, let's split up and inspect for damage.
translation.it: Va bene, dividiamoci e ispezioniamo i danni.

translation.en: -Got it? -[all] Got it.
[Patty] Good it didn't happen while you were out there. Could have been exposed to radiation.
translation.it: Per fortuna non eri là fuori. Saresti stato esposto alle radiazioni.

translation.en: Luck was on my side.
I want to know why nobody told us that this sun sneezes.
translation.it: Non ci avevano detto che questo sole starnutisce.

translation.en: [Patty] Yeah, that was a little too close for comfort, if you ask me.
translation.it: Ci siamo andati troppo vicini per i miei gusti.

translation.en: It's just a little bit of bad luck.
translation.it: È stata solo un po' di sfortuna.

translation.en: Wow. It's huge.
[Patty] What is it, Mack?
[Mack] The atmospheric transformer.
[chuckles] It'd better be big.
That thing is gonna give the entire planet a makeover.
[Mack] Yeah.
Technically, the plants will do most of the work.
translation.it: Le piante faranno la maggior parte del lavoro,

translation.en: But we need the reactor to stabilize the atmosphere first.
translation.it: ma ci serve il reattore per stabilizzare l'atmosfera.

translation.en: Can anyone tell what's going on with the printing room?
translation.it: Che sta succedendo nella sala di stampa?

translation.en: The Womb should've finished printing Lewis by now, but he hasn't come out.
translation.it: Il Grembo dovrebbe aver finito di stampare Lewis, ma non è ancora uscito.

translation.en: [Oscar] Hold on. The Womb is currently in operation.
translation.it: Un momento. Il Grembo è in funzione.

translation.en: That's odd. There's an error message.
translation.it: Strano. C'è un messaggio di errore.

translation.en: [Nina] I'd like to take a look inside,
but entry during printing is a violation of privacy. Is everyone okay with me going in?
translation.it: ma durante la stampa violerei la privacy. Siamo tutti d'accordo?

translation.en: -[Oscar] Of course. -[Mack] Permission granted.
[Patty] I agree as well.
What is this?
What's wrong?
-[Nina panting] It's Lewis, he… -[Mack] Nina?
[Nina] Get over here! Come quickly!
[Patty gasps] Oh, my God!
Thank you.
Feeling better?
[sighs] I guess so.
The DNA analysis shows this is definitely Lewis.
translation.it: L'analisi del DNA dice che si tratta di Lewis.

translation.en: But it is clearly not. Just look at him.
translation.it: Ma chiaramente non lo è. Guardatelo.

translation.en: There has to have been an error during the printing.
translation.it: Sarà stato un errore di stampa.

translation.en: It must have been from the flare. Maybe it caused a surge in The Womb that led to a malfunction.
translation.it: Il sovraccarico dovuto all'eruzione avrà causato un guasto nel Grembo.

translation.en: [Mack] So, is he alive?
The heart is beating.
[Mack] Any brain activity?
Yes, but only weak activity.
It's a state known as an alpha coma.
translation.it: È in uno stato chiamato coma alfa.

translation.en: [Mack] Have there been other cases of The Womb failing during a printing?
translation.it: C'è mai stato un guasto nel Grembo durante una stampa?

translation.en: [Nina] None that have been made public.
translation.it: Non è mai stato reso noto.

translation.en: There may have been during the development phase.
translation.it: Forse durante la fase di sviluppo.

translation.en: Remember, it wasn't made by human hands.
[Mack] When dealing with printing errors,
translation.it: Nel caso di errori di stampa,

translation.en: those who are at the scene decide what course of action to take, correct?
translation.it: i presenti decidono quali misure adottare, corretto?

translation.en: Yes, that's right.
[Mack] We should reprint a proper Lewis. It's for the good of the mission.
translation.it: Per il bene della missione, dovremmo ristampare Lewis

translation.en: We should dispose of this one.
But that would be murder, wouldn't it?
Do we have the right to take his life just because he lacks consciousness?
translation.it: Abbiamo il diritto di ucciderlo solo perché è privo di coscienza?

translation.en: He's still a living being.
Patty, we need material that contains Lewis's genetic information
translation.it: Ci serve del materiale che contenga le informazioni genetiche di Lewis

translation.en: in order to reprint him.
The quickest way to do that is to disassemble this one
translation.it: Il modo più veloce è disassemblarlo

translation.en: and use it as biomaterial.
And it can't be from just anyone.
translation.it: Non può essere di nessun altro.

translation.en: To create Lewis, we need Lewis's biomaterial.
translation.it: Per creare Lewis, ci serve il suo biomateriale.

translation.en: We can make more by cultivating. The bodies that we have now were made
translation.it: Ne produrremo altro. I nostri corpi attuali sono stati fatti

translation.en: by growing material from harvested cells, right?
I did go ahead and start the cell cultivation, just in case.
translation.it: Nel dubbio, ho già iniziato la coltura cellulare.

translation.en: But it's going to take a while.
[Mack] If we wait, our schedule will be delayed.
translation.it: Se aspettiamo, ci saranno dei ritardi.

translation.en: Lewis is responsible for the atmospheric transformer.
translation.it: Lewis è responsabile del trasformatore atmosferico.

translation.en: We should destroy this one and print a new, proper Lewis immediately.
translation.it: Dobbiamo subito distruggerlo e stampare un nuovo Lewis.

translation.en: Look, I agree with Mack. If I were in that state, I wouldn't want to be kept alive.
translation.it: Io sono con Mack. Se fossi in quello stato, non vorrei vivere.

translation.en: You're just trying to detract from the fact that it's murder.
translation.it: Ciò non toglie che si tratti di omicidio.

translation.en: That is not a person. It's just a lump of flesh.
translation.it: Non è una persona. È solo un ammasso di carne.

translation.en: [sighs] Patty… According to the rules set forth by the Planetary Development Agency,
translation.it: Patty, secondo le norme stabilite dall'Agenzia di Sviluppo Planetario,

translation.en: major decisions require unanimous consent.
If you aren't in agreement, we can't euthanize him.
translation.it: Se non sei d'accordo, non potremo sopprimerlo.

translation.en: We can put it in the record that you initially objected,
translation.it: Metteremo a verbale che inizialmente eri contraria,

translation.en: so it won't be on your conscience.
[Oscar] We respect your principles, Patty, we do.
And all life should be protected, without exception.
translation.it: Tutte le vite andrebbero protette, nessuna esclusa.

translation.en: But we're in a special situation.
That's not it at all.
[Nina] I can take care of the procedure.
He'll just go into a deep sleep, without ever knowing he was even born.
translation.it: Cadrà in un sonno profondo, non saprà nemmeno di essere nato.

translation.en: Okay, if there's no other choice.
translation.it: Ok, se non c'è altra scelta…

translation.en: It just doesn't seem right to let a soul be destroyed.
translation.it: È che non mi sembra giusto distruggere un'anima.

translation.en: [Oscar] A soul, huh?
Do we even have souls?
Beats me.
Seriously, though, are all botanists like her?
translation.it: Tutti i botanici sono come lei?

translation.en: [Oscar] I think she might be especially compassionate. She says she can even talk to cats and dogs.
translation.it: Forse è particolarmente compassionevole. Dice di poter parlare a cani e gatti.

translation.en: Well, having a botanist is essential for this mission.
translation.it: Beh, un botanico è essenziale per la missione.

translation.en: If there aren't plants rooted into the surface of Planet X-10, there'll be no stable supply of oxygen.
translation.it: Senza piante sulla superficie di X-10 non ci sarà fornitura stabile di ossigeno.

translation.en: Yeah, sure, but… [scoffs] …this isn't normal.
I'm not talking about her. I mean all of us.
translation.it: Non parlo di lei. Parlo di tutti noi.

translation.en: We asked her to agree to kill one of our own.
translation.it: Le abbiamo chiesto di acconsentire a uccidere uno di noi.

translation.en: That's not on us.
Blame whoever thought of printing human beings in the first place.
translation.it: ma di chi in primo luogo ha pensato di stampare esseri umani.

translation.en: You know living things can't travel through subspace. This was our only choice.
translation.it: Nessuno può viaggiare nel subspazio. Non c'era altra scelta.

translation.en: Hi, Nina. How are you feeling?
Have you seen Planet X-10 yet?
translation.it: Hai già visto il pianeta X-10?

translation.en: I am the original version of you.
translation.it: Io sono la tua versione originale.

translation.en: I recorded this right before leaving Earth.
I left a present for you. I hope you found it.
translation.it: Ti ho lasciato un regalo. Spero tu l'abbia trovato.

translation.en: If you, the printed version of me,
translation.it: Se tu, la mia versione stampata,

translation.en: properly share the same consciousness and memories of the past,
translation.it: condividi la mia stessa coscienza e i miei ricordi,

translation.en: then you should know what it is.
It's the cat doll from our childhood. [chuckles]
translation.it: È il gatto della nostra infanzia.

translation.en: It's always been by my side, watching over me,
translation.it: È sempre stato al mio fianco a proteggermi

translation.en: and-- and now I'm giving it to you.
translation.it: e ora lo do a te.

translation.en: [chuckles] She's thinking of me
so that, as a printed copy, I don't forget that I'm human.
translation.it: la sua copia stampata, così che non dimentichi di essere umana.

translation.en: [on screen] So, I guess I'll see you in a hundred years.
translation.it: Quindi, ci vediamo tra cento anni.

translation.en: By that time, a green paradise will have spread out over the surface of Planet X-10.
translation.it: A quel punto, un paradiso verde si estenderà sulla superficie di X-10.

translation.en: This smell really takes me back to Earth.
translation.it: Quest'odore mi ricorda davvero la Terra.

translation.en: The wind, the sun…
[chuckles] …the swing that was in my backyard.
[Mack] It's going to take three syringes?
The first is a sedative, the next is a muscle relaxant,
translation.it: La prima è un sedativo, la seconda un rilassante muscolare

translation.en: and the last one stops the heart from beating.
translation.it: e l'ultima ferma il battito cardiaco.

translation.en: A sedative?
[Nina] It's the most humane process.
Is Patty there with you?
No. She's in the Greenhouse.
[Oscar] She doesn't wanna see this.
[Nina] Okay, I guess I should get started.
[Mack] Please.
You shouldn't feel a thing.
You'll just start sleeping a little deeper than you are now.
translation.it: Inizierai solo a dormire in modo un po' più profondo.

translation.en: You're going to be reborn.
Your being here was a mistake.
Wait.
What?
Never mind. Must be imagining things.
translation.it: Non importa. Me lo sarò immaginato.

translation.en: Good night. Sleep peacefully.
-Nina! -Damn it!
[Oscar] Patty! Patty! C-Can you hear me?
Oscar, what's wrong?
[Oscar] Stay where you are.
Why? What's happening?
[Oscar] It's-- It's Lewis. He got up, and--
-[alert blaring] -[automated voice] Fire! Fire!
All crew members, please evacuate immediately.
-[Mack, Oscar shuddering] -Fire! Fire! Fire! Fire!
Oscar, help Nina. [panting]
[automated voice] Fire! Fire!
-All crew members, please evacuate… -Can anyone hear me?
-This is Patty. Please respond. What ha-- -[objects crash]
[gasps] Lewis?
Patty! Run!
Nina! Are you all right? Nina.
Oh, no. Oh, no.
[Mack] Lewis?
Lewis! [grunts]
I-- I feel like we should say something.
You go ahead. I don't have any words.
translation.it: Fa' pure. Io non ho parole.

translation.en: Goodbye, Nina.
I-- I'm sorry.
Now it's more like "The Tomb" than The Womb.
translation.it: Ora più che il "Grembo" è la "Tomba".

translation.en: Those words are more connected than you might think.
translation.it: Sono parole più legate di quanto pensi.

translation.en: They say, long ago, that people built graves and temples
translation.it: Tempo fa, la gente costruiva fosse e templi

translation.en: as wombs for the dead to be reborn in.
translation.it: per accogliere la rinascita dei morti.

translation.en: Don't tell me you're gonna use that for self-defense.
translation.it: Non dirmi che userai quella per difenderti.

translation.en: No, for hunting.
You know the printer won't let us make weapons. This is as good as it gets.
translation.it: Non possiamo stampare armi. Non abbiamo di meglio.

translation.en: It's too dangerous to leave out there.
[Oscar] The reprint is starting. We'll see Nina in half an hour.
translation.it: La ristampa è iniziata. Rivedremo Nina tra mezz'ora.

translation.en: [Nina] Vision, normal.
Hearing, normal.
Smell… [sniffs] …normal.
Pain perception, normal.
Memories, clear.
I am human.
